ps1.5:1.4: Suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho—
ps1.5:2.2: suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho;
ps1.5:2.3: ajjhattavuṭṭhāno vimokkho, bahiddhāvuṭṭhāno vimokkho, dubhato vuṭṭhāno vimokkho;
ps1.5:2.4: ajjhattavuṭṭhānā cattāro vimokkhā, bahiddhāvuṭṭhānā cattāro vimokkhā, dubhato vuṭṭhānā cattāro vimokkhā;
ps1.5:2.5: ajjhattavuṭṭhānānaṁ anulomā cattāro vimokkhā, bahiddhāvuṭṭhānānaṁ anulomā cattāro vimokkhā, dubhato vuṭṭhānānaṁ anulomā cattāro vimokkhā;
ps1.5:2.6: ajjhattavuṭṭhānapaṭippassaddhī cattāro vimokkhā, bahiddhāvuṭṭhānapaṭippassaddhī cattāro vimokkhā, dubhato vuṭṭhānapaṭippassaddhī cattāro vimokkhā;
ps1.5:2.7: rūpī rūpāni passatīti vimokkho, ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti vimokkho, subhaṁ teva adhimutto hotīti vimokkho;
ps1.5:2.8: ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti vimokkho, viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpatti vimokkho, ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti vimokkho;
ps1.5:2.16: nirāmisānirāmisataro vimokkho, paṇihito vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho, paṇihitappaṭippassaddhi vimokkho;
ps1.5:3.2: Idha bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati—
ps1.5:4.2: Idha bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati—
ps1.5:5.2: Idha bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati—
ps1.5:9.2: Sotāpattimaggo sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsā diṭṭhānusayā vicikicchānusayā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.
ps1.5:9.3: Sakadāgāmimaggo oḷārikā kāmarāgasaññojanā paṭighasaññojanā oḷārikā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.
ps1.5:9.4: Anāgāmimaggo anusahagatā kāmarāgasaññojanā paṭighasaññojanā anusahagatā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.
ps1.5:9.5: Arahattamaggo rūparāgā arūparāgā mānā uddhaccā avijjāya mānānusayā bhavarāgānusayā avijjānusayā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.
ps1.5:10.2: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca, dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ paṭilābhatthāya …pe…
ps1.5:10.4: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca—
ps1.5:11.2: Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṁ paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca, viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiṁ …pe…
ps1.5:11.4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṁ paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca—
ps1.5:12.6: ime dubhato vuṭṭhānānaṁ anulomā cattāro vimokkhā.
ps1.5:13.2: Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭilābho vā vipāko vā, dutiyassa jhānassa …pe…
ps1.5:13.4: catutthassa jhānassa paṭilābho vā vipāko vā—
ps1.5:14.2: Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā paṭilābho vā vipāko vā, viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiyā …pe…
ps1.5:15.2: Sotāpattimaggassa sotāpattiphalaṁ, sakadāgāmimaggassa sakadāgāmiphalaṁ, anāgāmimaggassa anāgāmiphalaṁ, arahattamaggassa arahattaphalaṁ—
ps1.5:16.2: Idhekacco ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ nīlanimittaṁ manasikaroti, nīlasaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:16.3: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ karoti, sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:16.4: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ katvā sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpetvā bahiddhā nīlanimitte cittaṁ upasaṁharati, nīlasaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:16.5: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ karoti, sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:16.6: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ katvā upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpetvā āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps1.5:16.8: “ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca ubhayamidaṁ rūpan”ti, rūpasaññī hoti.
ps1.5:16.12: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ karoti, sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:16.13: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ katvā sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpetvā bahiddhā odātanimitte cittaṁ upasaṁharati, odātasaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:16.14: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ karoti, sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:16.15: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ katvā sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpetvā āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps1.5:16.17: “ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca ubhayamidaṁ rūpan”ti, rūpasaññī hoti.
ps1.5:17.2: Idhekacco ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ nīlanimittaṁ na manasikaroti, nīlasaññaṁ na paṭilabhati;
ps1.5:17.3: bahiddhā nīlanimitte cittaṁ upasaṁharati, nīlasaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:17.4: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ karoti, sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:17.5: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ katvā sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpetvā āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps1.5:17.10: odātanimittaṁ na manasikaroti, odātasaññaṁ na paṭilabhati;
ps1.5:17.11: bahiddhā odātanimitte cittaṁ upasaṁharati, odātasaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:17.12: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ karoti, sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:17.13: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ katvā sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpetvā āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps1.5:17.16: Evaṁ ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti—
ps1.5:18.2: Idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ, tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
ps1.5:18.8: Upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati …pe…
ps1.5:19.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā “ananto ākāso”ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:20.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma “anantaṁ viññāṇan”ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:21.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma “natthi kiñcī”ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:22.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:23.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:24.2: Cattāri ca jhānāni catasso ca arūpasamāpattiyo—

ps1.5:26.2: Cattāri ca jhānāni, catasso ca arūpasamāpattiyo—

ps1.5:43.2: Siyā eko saññāvimokkho dasa saññāvimokkhā honti, dasa saññāvimokkhā eko saññāvimokkho hoti, vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:44.22: Evaṁ siyā eko saññāvimokkho dasa saññāvimokkhā honti, dasa saññāvimokkhā eko saññāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:45.5: Evaṁ siyā eko saññāvimokkho dasa saññāvimokkhā honti, dasa saññāvimokkhā eko saññāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:46.10: Evaṁ siyā, eko saññāvimokkho dasa saññāvimokkhā honti, dasa saññāvimokkhā eko saññāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena—
ps1.5:47.2: Siyā eko ñāṇavimokkho dasa ñāṇavimokkhā honti, dasa ñāṇavimokkhā eko ñāṇavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena siyāti.
ps1.5:47.4: Aniccānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ niccato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.6: Dukkhānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ sukhato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.8: Anattānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ attato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.10: Nibbidānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ nandiyā sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.12: Virāgānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ rāgato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.14: Nirodhānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ samudayato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.16: Paṭinissaggānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ ādānato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.18: Animittānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ nimittato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.20: Appaṇihitānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ paṇidhiyā sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.22: Suññatānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ abhinivesato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.24: Evaṁ siyā eko ñāṇavimokkho dasa ñāṇavimokkhā honti, dasa ñāṇavimokkhā eko ñāṇavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:48.1: Rūpe aniccānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ niccato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:48.3: rūpe suññatānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ abhinivesato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:48.5: Evaṁ siyā eko ñāṇavimokkho dasa ñāṇavimokkhā honti, dasa ñāṇavimokkhā eko ñāṇavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:49.6: jarāmaraṇe aniccānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ niccato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:49.8: jarāmaraṇe suññatānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ abhinivesato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:49.10: Evaṁ siyā eko ñāṇavimokkho dasa ñāṇavimokkhā honti, dasa ñāṇavimokkhā eko ñāṇavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena—
ps1.5:50.2: Siyā eko sītisiyāvimokkho dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā honti, dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā eko sītisiyāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena siyāti.
ps1.5:50.4: Aniccānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ niccato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.6: Dukkhānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ sukhato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.8: Anattānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ attato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.10: Nibbidānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ nandiyā santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.12: Virāgānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ rāgato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.14: Nirodhānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ samudayato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.16: Paṭinissaggānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ ādānato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.18: Animittānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ nimittato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.20: Appaṇihitānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ paṇidhiyā santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.22: Suññatānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ abhinivesato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.24: Evaṁ siyā eko sītisiyāvimokkho dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā honti, dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā eko sītisiyāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:51.1: Rūpe aniccānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ niccato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:51.3: rūpe suññatānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ abhinivesato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:51.5: Evaṁ siyā eko sītisiyāvimokkho dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā honti, dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā eko sītisiyāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:52.6: jarāmaraṇe aniccānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ niccato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:52.8: jarāmaraṇe suññatānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ abhinivesato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:52.10: Evaṁ siyā eko sītisiyāvimokkho dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā honti, dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā eko sītisiyāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena—
ps1.5:53.34: Jhāte ca jhāpe ca jānātīti—jhānavimokkho—ayaṁ jhānavimokkho.
ps1.5:54.2: Siyā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā honti, dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena siyāti.
ps1.5:54.24: Evaṁ siyā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā honti, dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:55.5: Evaṁ siyā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā honti, dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:56.10: Evaṁ siyā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā honti, dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:60.1: Yañca aniccānupassanañāṇaṁ, yañca anattānupassanañāṇaṁ, yañca animittānupassanañāṇaṁ, yañca suññatānupassanañāṇaṁ—
ps1.5:60.4: Yañca dukkhānupassanañāṇaṁ, yaṁ ca nibbidānupassanañāṇaṁ, yañca virāgānupassanañāṇaṁ, yañca appaṇihitānupassanañāṇaṁ—
ps1.5:61.1: Tīṇi kho panimāni vimokkhamukhāni lokaniyyānāya saṁvattanti.
ps1.5:61.2: Sabbasaṅkhāre paricchedaparivaṭumato samanupassanatāya animittāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, sabbasaṅkhāresu manosamuttejanatāya appaṇihitāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, sabbadhamme parato samanupassanatāya suññatāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya—
ps1.5:62.4: Aniccato manasikaroto khayato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhanti, dukkhato manasikaroto bhayato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhanti, anattato manasikaroto suññato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhanti.
ps1.5:63.1: Aniccato manasikaroto kiṁ bahulaṁ cittaṁ hoti?
ps1.5:63.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto kiṁ bahulaṁ cittaṁ hoti?
ps1.5:63.3: Anattato manasikaroto kiṁ bahulaṁ cittaṁ hoti?
ps1.5:65.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti, bhāvanāya katindriyāni tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, ko bhāveti?
ps1.5:65.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti, bhāvanāya katindriyāni tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, ko bhāveti?

ps1.5:70.9: Jhānaphassaṁ paṭhamaṁ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikarotīti—
ps1.5:70.11: “Dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho nirodho”ti ñātaṁ hoti diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāyāti—
ps1.5:70.13: Yo cāyaṁ puggalo saddhāvimutto, yo ca kāyasakkhī, yo ca diṭṭhippatto, siyā ime tayo puggalā saddhāvimuttāpi kāyasakkhīpi diṭṭhippattāpi vatthuvasena pariyāyena siyāti.
ps1.5:70.21: Evaṁ ime tayo puggalā saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā.
ps1.5:71.7: Evaṁ ime tayo puggalā samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī.
ps1.5:72.7: Evaṁ ime tayo puggalā paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:73.1: Yo cāyaṁ puggalo saddhāvimutto, yo ca kāyasakkhī, yo ca diṭṭhippatto, evaṁ siyā ime tayo puggalā saddhāvimuttāpi kāyasakkhīpi diṭṭhippattāpi vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:73.2: Yo cāyaṁ puggalo saddhāvimutto, yo ca kāyasakkhī, yo ca diṭṭhippatto, siyā ime tayo puggalā …pe…
ps1.5:73.3: aññoyeva saddhāvimutto, añño kāyasakkhī, añño diṭṭhippatto.

ps1.5:74.10: Aññoyeva saddhāvimutto, añño kāyasakkhī, añño diṭṭhippatto.
ps1.5:75.1: Aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti, saddhindriyassa adhimattattā sotāpattimaggaṁ paṭilabhati;
ps1.5:75.4: Cattārindriyāni tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
ps1.5:75.5: Saddhindriyassa vasena catunnaṁ indriyānaṁ bhāvanā hoti.
ps1.5:75.6: Ye hi keci saddhindriyassa vasena sotāpattimaggaṁ paṭilabhanti, sabbe te saddhānusārino.

ps1.5:76.5: Saddhindriyassa vasena cattārindriyāni bhāvitāni honti subhāvitāni.

ps1.5:83.1: Ye hi keci nekkhammaṁ bhāvitā vā bhāventi vā bhāvissanti vā, adhigatā vā adhigacchanti vā adhigamissanti vā, pattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, paṭiladdhā vā paṭilabhanti vā paṭilabhissanti vā, paṭividdhā vā paṭivijjhanti vā paṭivijjhissanti vā, sacchikatā vā sacchikaronti vā sacchikarissanti vā, phassitā vā phassanti vā phassissanti vā, vasippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, pāramippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, vesārajjappattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:85.8: ye hi keci aṭṭha vimokkhe bhāvitā vā bhāventi vā bhāvissanti vā, adhigatā vā adhigacchanti vā adhigamissanti vā, pattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, paṭiladdhā vā paṭilabhanti vā paṭilabhissanti vā, paṭividdhā vā paṭivijjhanti vā paṭivijjhissanti vā, sacchikatā vā sacchikaronti vā sacchikarissanti vā, phassitā vā phassanti vā phassissanti vā, vasippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā pāramippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, vesārajjappattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:86.1: Ye hi keci catasso paṭisambhidā pattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā …pe…

ps1.5:87.1: Ye hi keci tisso vijjā paṭividdhā vā paṭivijjhanti vā paṭivijjhissanti vā …pe…

ps1.5:88.1: Ye hi keci tisso sikkhā sikkhitā vā sikkhanti vā sikkhissanti vā, sacchikatā vā sacchikaronti vā sacchikarissanti vā, phassitā vā phassanti vā phassissanti vā, vasippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, pāramippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, vesārajjappattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā, sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:89.1: Ye hi keci dukkhaṁ parijānanti samudayaṁ pajahanti nirodhaṁ sacchikaronti maggaṁ bhāventi, sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:90.5: Dukkhasaccaṁ pariññāpaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhati, samudayasaccaṁ pahānappaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhati, nirodhasaccaṁ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhati, maggasaccaṁ bhāvanāpaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:90.7: Imehi catūhākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhanto saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimutto, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippatto.
ps1.5:91.3: Navahākārehi saccappaṭivedho hoti, navahākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:91.4: Dukkhasaccaṁ pariññāpaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhati, samudayasaccaṁ pahānappaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhati, nirodhasaccaṁ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhati, maggasaccaṁ bhāvanāpaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:91.5: Abhiññāpaṭivedho ca sabbadhammānaṁ, pariññāpaṭivedho ca sabbasaṅkhārānaṁ, pahānappaṭivedho ca sabbākusalānaṁ, bhāvanāpaṭivedho ca catunnaṁ maggānaṁ, sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho ca nirodhassa.
ps1.5:91.7: Imehi navahākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhanto saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimutto, samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī, paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippatto.

ps1.5:95.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, ko bhāveti?
ps1.5:95.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, ko bhāveti?
ps1.5:95.3: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, ko bhāveti?

ps1.5:96.2: Bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti.
ps1.5:96.6: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa appaṇihito vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:96.7: Bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti.
ps1.5:96.11: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa suññato vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:96.12: Bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti.
ps1.5:97.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, paṭivedhakāle katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, paṭivedhāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, kenaṭṭhena paṭivedho?
ps1.5:97.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, paṭivedhakāle katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, paṭivedhāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, kenaṭṭhena paṭivedho?
ps1.5:97.3: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya kati vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, paṭivedhakāle katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, paṭivedhāya kativimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, kenaṭṭhena bhāvanā, kenaṭṭhena paṭivedho?
ps1.5:98.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa animitto vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, paṭivedhakālepi animitto vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, paṭivedhāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā, dassanaṭṭhena paṭivedho, evaṁ paṭivijjhantopi bhāveti, bhāventopi paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:98.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa appaṇihito vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, paṭivedhakālepi appaṇihito vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, paṭivedhāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā, dassanaṭṭhena paṭivedho, evaṁ paṭivijjhantopi bhāveti, bhāventopi paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:98.3: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa suññato vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, paṭivedhakālepi suññato vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, paṭivedhāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti, sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti, ekarasā honti, ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā, dassanaṭṭhena paṭivedho, evaṁ paṭivijjhantopi bhāveti, bhāventopi paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:99.1: Aniccato manasikaroto katamo vimokkho adhimatto hoti?
ps1.5:99.3: Dukkhato manasikaroto katamo vimokkho adhimatto hoti?
ps1.5:99.5: Anattato manasikaroto katamo vimokkho adhimatto hoti?
ps1.5:100.1: Aniccato manasikaroto animitto vimokkho adhimatto hoti.
ps1.5:100.3: Dukkhato manasikaroto appaṇihito vimokkho adhimatto hoti.
ps1.5:100.5: Anattato manasikaroto suññato vimokkho adhimatto hoti.
ps1.5:101.9: Jhānaphassaṁ paṭhamaṁ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikarotīti—
ps1.5:101.11: “Dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho nirodho”ti viññātaṁ hoti diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāyāti—
ps1.5:101.13: ye hi keci nekkhammaṁ bhāvitā vā bhāventi vā bhāvissanti vā …pe…
ps1.5:101.14: sabbe te animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena kāyasakkhī, suññatavimokkhassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:102.4: ye hi keci dukkhaṁ parijānanti, samudayaṁ pajahanti, nirodhaṁ sacchikaronti, maggaṁ bhāventi, sabbe te animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhāvimuttā, appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena kāyasakkhī, suññatavimokkhassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:103.5: Dukkhasaccaṁ pariññāpaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhati, samudayasaccaṁ pahānapaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:103.9: Imehi catūhākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhanto animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhāvimutto, appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena kāyasakkhī, suññatavimokkhassa vasena diṭṭhippatto.
ps1.5:104.8: Imehi navahākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhanto animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhāvimutto, appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena kāyasakkhī, suññatavimokkhassa vasena diṭṭhippatto.
ps1.5:105.1: Aniccato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati?
ps1.5:105.3: Kathaṁ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato sudiṭṭhā honti?
ps1.5:105.5: Dukkhato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati?
ps1.5:105.7: Kathaṁ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhato sudiṭṭhā honti?
ps1.5:105.9: Anattato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati?
ps1.5:105.11: Kathaṁ tadanvayena sabbe dhammā anattato sudiṭṭhā honti?
ps1.5:106.1: Aniccato manasikaronto nimittaṁ yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati;
ps1.5:106.4: Evaṁ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps1.5:106.6: Dukkhato manasikaronto pavattaṁ yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati;
ps1.5:106.9: Evaṁ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhato sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps1.5:106.11: Anattato manasikaronto nimittañca pavattañca yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati;
ps1.5:106.14: Evaṁ tadanvayena sabbe dhammā anattato sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps1.5:107.1: Yañca yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ yañca sammādassanaṁ yā ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇā, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nānanti?
ps1.5:107.2: Yañca yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ yañca sammādassanaṁ yā ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṁ.
ps1.5:108.6: Anattato manasikaroto nimittañca pavattañca bhayato upaṭṭhāti.
ps1.5:109.1: Yā ca bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā yañca ādīnave ñāṇaṁ yā ca nibbidā, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nānanti?
ps1.5:109.2: Yā ca bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā yañca ādīnave ñāṇaṁ yā ca nibbidā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṁ.
ps1.5:110.1: Yā ca anattānupassanā yā ca suññatānupassanā, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nānanti?
ps1.5:110.2: Yā ca anattānupassanā yā ca suññatānupassanā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṁ.
ps1.5:111.1: Aniccato manasikaroto kiṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati?
ps1.5:111.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto kiṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati?
ps1.5:111.3: Anattato manasikaroto kiṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati?
ps1.5:111.4: Aniccato manasikaroto nimittaṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
ps1.5:111.5: Dukkhato manasikaroto pavattaṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
ps1.5:111.6: Anattato manasikaroto nimittañca pavattañca paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
ps1.5:112.1: Yā ca muccitukamyatā yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nānanti?
ps1.5:112.2: Yā ca muccitukamyatā yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṁ.
ps1.5:113.1: Aniccato manasikaroto kuto cittaṁ vuṭṭhāti, kattha cittaṁ pakkhandati?
ps1.5:113.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto kuto cittaṁ vuṭṭhāti, kattha cittaṁ pakkhandati?
ps1.5:113.3: Anattato manasikaroto kuto cittaṁ vuṭṭhāti, kattha cittaṁ pakkhandati?
ps1.5:113.4: Aniccato manasikaroto nimittā cittaṁ vuṭṭhāti, animitte cittaṁ pakkhandati.
ps1.5:113.5: Dukkhato manasikaroto pavattā cittaṁ vuṭṭhāti, appavatte cittaṁ pakkhandati.
ps1.5:113.6: Anattato manasikaroto nimittā ca pavattā ca cittaṁ vuṭṭhāti, animitte appavatte nirodhe nibbānadhātuyā cittaṁ pakkhandati.
ps1.5:114.1: Yā ca bahiddhāvuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā ye ca gotrabhū dhammā, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nānanti?
ps1.5:114.2: Yā ca bahiddhāvuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā ye ca gotrabhū dhammā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṁ.
ps1.5:116.1: Yā ca dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā yañca magge ñāṇaṁ, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nānanti?
ps1.5:116.2: Yā ca dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā yañca magge ñāṇaṁ, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṁ.
ps1.5:118.1: Katamehi catūhākārehi tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:118.3: Kathaṁ ādhipateyyaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:118.4: Aniccato manasikaroto animitto vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, dukkhato manasikaroto appaṇihito vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti, anattato manasikaroto suññato vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:118.5: Evaṁ ādhipateyyaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:119.1: Kathaṁ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:119.2: Aniccato manasikaronto animittavimokkhassa vasena cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāti, dukkhato manasikaronto appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāti, anattato manasikaronto suññatavimokkhassa vasena cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāti.
ps1.5:119.3: Evaṁ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:120.1: Kathaṁ abhinīhāraṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:120.2: Aniccato manasikaronto animittavimokkhassa vasena cittaṁ abhinīharati, dukkhato manasikaronto appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena cittaṁ abhinīharati, anattato manasikaronto suññatavimokkhassa vasena cittaṁ abhinīharati.
ps1.5:120.3: Evaṁ abhinīhāraṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:121.1: Kathaṁ niyyānaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:121.2: Aniccato manasikaronto animittavimokkhassa vasena nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ niyyāti, dukkhato manasikaronto appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ niyyāti, anattato manasikaronto suññatavimokkhassa vasena nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ niyyāti.
ps1.5:121.3: Evaṁ niyyānaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:121.4: Imehi catūhākārehi tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:122.1: Katamehi sattahākārehi tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:122.2: Samodhānaṭṭhena, adhigamanaṭṭhena, paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena, sacchikiriyaṭṭhena, phassanaṭṭhena, abhisamayaṭṭhena.
ps1.5:122.3: Kathaṁ samodhānaṭṭhena adhigamanaṭṭhena paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena sacchikiriyaṭṭhena phassanaṭṭhena abhisamayaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:122.12: Evaṁ samodhānaṭṭhena adhigamanaṭṭhena paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena sacchikiriyaṭṭhena phassanaṭṭhena abhisamayaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:123.7: Yena nimittena animitto, tattha na paṇidahatīti—
ps1.5:123.9: Evaṁ samodhānaṭṭhena adhigamanaṭṭhena paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena sacchikiriyaṭṭhena phassanaṭṭhena abhisamayaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:124.5: Yena nimittena animitto, tattha na paṇidahatīti—
ps1.5:124.9: Evaṁ samodhānaṭṭhena adhigamanaṭṭhena paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena sacchikiriyaṭṭhena phassanaṭṭhena abhisamayaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:124.10: Imehi sattahākārehi tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:125.1: Atthi vimokkho, atthi mukhaṁ, atthi vimokkhamukhaṁ, atthi vimokkhapaccanīkaṁ, atthi vimokkhānulomaṁ, atthi vimokkhavivaṭṭo, atthi vimokkhabhāvanā, atthi vimokkhappaṭippassaddhi.
ps1.5:126.2: Suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho.
ps1.5:132.2: Ye tattha jātā anavajjakusalā bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, idaṁ mukhaṁ.
ps1.5:133.2: Yaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ nirodho nibbānaṁ, idaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ.
ps1.5:134.2: Tīṇi akusalamūlāni vimokkhapaccanīkāni, tīṇi duccaritāni vimokkhapaccanīkāni, sabbepi akusalā dhammā vimokkhapaccanīkā, idaṁ vimokkhapaccanīkaṁ.
ps1.5:135.2: Tīṇi kusalamūlāni vimokkhānulomāni, tīṇi sucaritāni vimokkhānulomāni, sabbepi kusalā dhammā vimokkhānulomā, idaṁ vimokkhānulomaṁ.
ps1.5:136.2: Saññāvivaṭṭo, cetovivaṭṭo, cittavivaṭṭo, ñāṇavivaṭṭo, vimokkhavivaṭṭo, saccavivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:137.1: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo tattha cetovivaṭṭo, yattha cetovivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo, yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo tattha cittavivaṭṭo, yattha cittavivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:137.2: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo tattha ñāṇavivaṭṭo, yattha ñāṇavivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:137.3: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo tattha vimokkhavivaṭṭo, yattha vimokkhavivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:137.4: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo vimokkhavivaṭṭo tattha saccavivaṭṭo, yattha saccavivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo vimokkhavivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:138.2: Paṭhamassa jhānassa āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṁ, dutiyassa jhānassa āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṁ, tatiyassa jhānassa āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṁ, catutthassa jhānassa āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṁ, ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṁ, viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiyā …pe…
ps1.5:138.4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṁ, sotāpattimaggassa āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṁ, sakadāgāmimaggassa āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṁ, anāgāmimaggassa āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṁ, arahattamaggassa āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṁ, ayaṁ vimokkhabhāvanā.
ps1.5:139.2: Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭilābho vā vipāko vā, dutiyassa jhānassa paṭilābho vā vipāko vā, tatiyassa jhānassa …pe…
ps1.5:139.7: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā paṭilābho vā vipāko vā, sotāpattimaggassa sotāpattiphalaṁ, sakadāgāmimaggassa sakadāgāmiphalaṁ, anāgāmimaggassa anāgāmiphalaṁ, arahattamaggassa arahattaphalaṁ, ayaṁ vimokkhappaṭippassaddhīti.
